english.segment1: Hello, I swear I won't be too long. Hello, I promise I'll be real strong. Wait up, I just wanna tell you. Hold up, why are you still here?
english.segment2: I've been dirtier than you wanna know. I've left earlier than you'll ever know
english.segment3: Why do, you wanna be all listenin' to me. Why do, you spread your arms and tell me I'm free. Why do, you wanna be in my life. In my life
english.segment4: I've been dirtier than you wanna know. I've left earlier than you'll ever know
english.segment5: Jesus, tease us. There's something about your name. Master, saviour, Jesus
english.segment6: I've been dirtier than you wanna know. I've left earlier than you'll ever know. Jesus. Jesus
